text: John Albert Powley (3 August 1936 – 16 October 2020) was a British Conservative Party politician. He was elected as the Member of Parliament for Norwich South in the Conservative landslide at the 1983 general election. However, at the 1987 election he lost his seat in a narrow defeat. Powley died on 16 October 2020, at the age of 84.Members of our Association who have died during 2020 ==References== ==Other websites== *Eastern Daily Press, 25 May 2013. title: John Powley
